content: Convey subscription notifications with a Bundle where .entry[0] is a SubscriptionStatus resource

1. I would really prefer for this to be called PublicationStatus (or NotificationStatus).
  2. Will this be a new Bundle.type?

Other than that, definitely support the general idea.

1. There are a lot of opinions on this - I can do another poll, but that had the most consensus (many wanted something else, but different somethings else before).
  2. Yes, there will be a new bundle type.
If there is another poll, can it have ranked-choice voting and only few (<=3) options? I will probably raise this at the FHIR-I call...

Probably? Been using Zulip polls for a low bar, but not particularly tied to it.
I don't know that I can get it down to that low a number of choices based on the feedback I've received though)
Yeah, Zulip polls don't support ranked choice and don't prevent users from adding options ;-)

By popular demand: there is a new poll for the additional subscription resource.
